entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pine Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Becoming a few clouds near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
